import React, {useContext} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {GlobalState} from '../../../../GlobalState' function BtnRender({product}) { const state = useContext(GlobalState) //const [products] = state.productsAPI.products const [isAdmin] = state.userAPI.isAdmin return (
{ isAdmin ? <> Delete Edit : <> Buy View }
) } export default BtnRender
